properties.Name: ProductType
properties.Description:
A means of categorizing products by functions performed, characteristics or similar common characteristics.

Ex:
- Retail Product
- Apparel Product
- Beauty & Bodycare Product
- Building Materials Product
- Cleaning Product
- Contact Lens Product
- Eyeglass Product
- Food & Beverage Product
- Footwear Product
- Gas & Oil Product
- Home Healthcare Product
- Meat Product
- Milk Cheese Egg Product
- Pet Food Product
- Produce Product
- Pharmacy Product
- Drug
- Facility Ancillary Service
- Service
- Vision Product
- Personal Care

This list can be expanded to provide an arbitrary grouping of products that reflect the product hierarchy.

Food & Beverage Ex:
- Diet drinks
- Energy drinks
- Natural drinks
- Caffeinated drinks
- Convenience Foods
- Organic Foods
- Frozen Foods
- Microwave Foods
- Baby Foods
- Diabetic Foods

Home Healthcare Ex:
-  Ambulatory Aids
-  Apnea Monitors 
-  Automobile Aids 
-  Back Supports 
-  Bathroom Safety Aids
-  Compression Systems
-  Cushioning Supports 
-  Daily Living Aids
-  Diabetes Products 
-  Diagnostic Equipment 
-  Dialysis Home Units
-  Emergency First Aid Supplies
-  Enuresis Alarms 
-  Feeding Systems 
-  Foot Care Products
-  Heat + Cold Therapy
-  Hospital Beds & Accessories
-  Lifts
-  Mastectomy Products 
-  Maternity Products 
-  Monitors
-  Orthopedia/Surgical Supports 
-  Ostomy Care 
-  Patient Alarms 
-  Pediatric Rehabilitation
-  Physical/Occupational Therapy Equi
-  Respiratory Care Equipment
-  Suction Equipment 
-  Traction Equipment

Tires Ex:
- Summer Tires
- Winder Tires
- All-season Tires
- Off-road Tires

Columns.Name: ProductTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Product Type.

Columns.Name: ProductTypeName
Columns.Description: The name of a Product Type.

Columns.Name: ProductTypeDescription
Columns.Description: The description of a Product Type.

Columns.Name: ProductCategoryId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Product Category.
